name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior AWS Engineer with over 10 years of experience in designing, developing, and optimizing backend systems in cloud environments. Proficient in **AWS**, **CI/CD**, and **Jenkins**, with hands-on expertise in **Terraform** and **AWS CDK** for infrastructure as code to enhance deployment efficiency. Skilled in creating high-performing APIs and automation tools using **Python** alongside familiar with **Groovy** and **Bash** scripting. Experienced in implementing testing frameworks with **Selenium**, **XRAY**, and **Gherkin** for Behavior Driven Development (BDD). Proven ability to contribute to large-scale, impactful projects for leading companies including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska, reinforcing a strong background in agile development and continuous improvement.
